description.raw:
* DSL code to generate jobs:

    * [[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/\_dsl\_vrx/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_vrx/)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/_dsl_vrx)
    
* Install job to test the released package

    * Tested:
    
        [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/vrx-install\_pkg\_melodic-bionic-amd64/34/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/vrx-install_pkg_melodic-bionic-amd64/34/)

    
    
* pr-any and -ci-default to test compilation

    * Tested:
    
        [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/vrx-ci-pr\_any\_melodic-bionic-amd64/12/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/vrx-ci-pr_any_melodic-bionic-amd64/12/)

    
    

The install test job is using OSRF repos to workaround on gazebo from Ubuntu problem:

[https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issues/2607/error-restcc-205-during-startup-gazebo](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issues/2607/error-restcc-205-during-startup-gazebo)
